column4: my question is : is it ipossible to change the size of the elements of hte dash ? (i'm not speaking about the icons of the launcher)
phpmyadmin problem: isn't just a problem with the conf of your apache ?
fyi, apt scripts are all configured for one direction only - upgrade.  so trying to downgrade will ususally result in very broken config files/etc.
thx for the info ... i had few doubt about that anyway... Could be an idea (not easy to implement i can understand) to enable the contrary ...
